original_title: Prostitution and Pornography in the Orient
overview: Film that "documents" the Asian sex trade, exploring bath houses, sex festivals, seedy bars and massage parlor to a soundtrack of funky grooves and "instructional" narration.
tagline: A staggering panorama of pagan societies that were perfecting carnal diversion and perversion while the rest of the world was still in caves!
title: Prostitution and Pornography in the Orient
